Vals.net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VA: <StringArray sr=""><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0>%atv App running Contains 'true' if the selected app is running.</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0></StringArray>

Action.label: skip remaining steps because obdlog is not set now
OBDII connects only AFTER torque starts. Therefore torque must start whenever tablet is in car e.g. when audio Bluetooth is connected
Necessary because of torque's greeting dialogue at startup

Action.Str: dumpsys audio | grep "^ uid" | grep -v "uid: -1" | grep "state: 3" || echo "0"
